title: Health Consumers' Online Search for Health Record Access: A Quantitative Study of Expectations in Australia and the US

abstract: Little is known about health consumer experiences of using the internet to search for details on how to apply to access one's own health record. This paper discusses the results of an online survey aimed at health consumers in Australia and the US who …
